# NextGen Learning - Tech & IT Courses Platform

## About
NextGen Learning is a comprehensive platform for comparing tech and IT courses across top Indian universities. We help students explore computer science, data science, artificial intelligence, machine learning, cybersecurity, cloud computing, and other technology programs.

## Website
https://www.nextgenlearning.dev

## Main Pages

### Core Pages
- https://www.nextgenlearning.dev/ - Home page
- https://www.nextgenlearning.dev/courses - Browse all tech courses
- https://www.nextgenlearning.dev/universities - View all universities
- https://www.nextgenlearning.dev/rankings - NIRF Ranking 2025 guide and university rankings comparison
- https://www.nextgenlearning.dev/fees-scholarships - Complete B.Tech CSE fees and scholarships guide
- https://www.nextgenlearning.dev/scholarships - Scholarship information
- https://www.nextgenlearning.dev/compare - Compare courses side-by-side
- https://www.nextgenlearning.dev/apply - Application form
- https://www.nextgenlearning.dev/about - About NextGen Learning
- https://www.nextgenlearning.dev/contact - Contact information
- https://www.nextgenlearning.dev/guides - Learning guides
- https://www.nextgenlearning.dev/faq - Frequently asked questions

### Universities
- https://www.nextgenlearning.dev/universities/chandigarh-university - Chandigarh University (NIRF 32, NAAC A+)
- https://www.nextgenlearning.dev/universities/sharda-university - Sharda University (NIRF 101-150, NAAC A+)
- https://www.nextgenlearning.dev/universities/galgotias-university - Galgotias University (NIRF 101-150, NAAC A+)
- https://www.nextgenlearning.dev/universities/noida-international-university - Noida International University (NIRF 201-250, NAAC A+)

## Course Categories

### B.Tech Programs
- B.Tech Computer Science & Engineering (CSE)
- B.Tech Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning (AI/ML)
- B.Tech Data Science
- B.Tech Cyber Security
- B.Tech Information Technology (IT)
- B.Tech Cloud Computing
- B.Tech Full Stack Development
- B.Tech Blockchain Technology
- B.Tech Internet of Things (IoT)

### Postgraduate Programs
- M.Tech Computer Science & Engineering
- MCA (Master of Computer Applications)
- M.Sc Computer Science

### Undergraduate Programs
- BCA (Bachelor of Computer Applications)
- B.Sc Computer Science

## Key Features

### Curriculum Information
Each course page includes:
- Total credits for the program
- Official syllabus PDF links
- Semester-wise course breakdown
- Course codes, names, credits, and types (Theory/Practical/Project/Elective)

### Course Comparison
- Compare up to 5 courses side-by-side
- View fees, scholarships, rankings, and duration
- Detailed fee breakdowns with all costs
- Year-wise payment schedules

### Scholarship Information
- All available scholarships listed
- Eligibility criteria for each tier
- Maximum scholarship calculations
- Year-wise fee breakdowns

## Universities Overview

### Chandigarh University
- Location: Mohali, Punjab
- NIRF 2025: 32nd Overall, 20th in Universities
- NAAC: A+ (3.28/4)
- Campus: 200+ acres smart campus
- Industry Partners: Google, Microsoft, Amazon, IBM, TCS, Infosys
- Scholarships: 35-50% (GPA-based)

### Sharda University
- Location: Greater Noida, Uttar Pradesh
- NIRF 2025: 101-150 Overall, 87th in Universities
- NAAC: A+
- Campus: 63-acre modern campus
- Special: Microsoft partnership, Ranked 1st Private University with highest international students
- Scholarships: 20-50% (GPA-based)

### Galgotias University
- Location: Greater Noida, Uttar Pradesh
- NIRF 2025: 101-150 Overall
- NAAC: A+ (3.37/4)
- Campus: 52-acre modern campus
- Special: NBA accredited programs, AACSB accredited School of Business
- Scholarships: 50-60% (program-based)

### Noida International University
- Location: Greater Noida, Uttar Pradesh
- NIRF 2025: 201-250 Overall
- NAAC: A+ (3.44/4)
- Campus: 75-acre modern campus
- Industry Partners: IBM, TCS partnerships
- Scholarships: 50% flat (no GPA requirement)

- WhatsApp: +918800996151

## Robots.txt

## Content Focus
This platform focuses exclusively on technology and IT-related courses including:
- Computer Science & Engineering
- Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
- Data Science & Analytics
- Cyber Security
- Cloud Computing
- Full Stack Development
- Blockchain Technology
- Internet of Things (IoT)
- Information Technology
- Software Engineering

## SEO-Optimized Pages

### Rankings & Fees Pages
- **NIRF Rankings** (`/rankings`): Complete guide to NIRF Ranking 2025 with detailed university rankings, ranking parameters explanation, NIRF vs NAAC comparison, and subject-wise rankings
- **Fees & Scholarships** (`/fees-scholarships`): Comprehensive B.Tech CSE fees guide with total fees 4 years breakdown, scholarship eligibility, payment structure, and university-wise fee comparison

## Data Structure
- All course data is stored in JSON format
- Each university has detailed program information
- Curriculum structures include semester-wise breakdowns
- Fee structures include all costs and scholarship options

## Last Updated
2026-01-21
